description:
Lightweight replacement of Lenovo Vantage for Lenovo Legion laptops.

Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a utility created for Lenovo Legion laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone.
What's Changed
General
- Added support for Legion 5 15AKP10.
- Added notification while Windows Dynamic Lighting feature is enabled.
- Added Vram Temperature to dashboard.
- Resolved an issue that caused Hybrid Mode to not function correctly. #38
- Resolved an issue where the new dashboard prevented the dGPU from powering off.
- Resolved an issue where after LLT startup, DGPU connect the GPU name still show as UNKNOWN.
- Moved PawnIO to a more optimal position.
- Improved notifications for installing PawnIO.
- Resolved an issue where Enable Logging will not print useful data.
- Resolved an issue on Legion 5i 15IRX10 model the FanCurve table is missing.
- Improved DashboardPage start speed.
Full Changelog: https://github.com/XKaguya/LenovoLegionToolkit/compare/v2.26.9.5...v2.26.9.6
